A mụrụ Tumusiime na 1989 na Kampala ma ọ bu otu nwa Enoch Tumusiime na Christine Asiimwe, obu onye Kabale, South Western Uganda. Ọ gara St Theresa Kisubi maka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, wee sonye na Kitante Hill Secondary School maka ọkwa "O" na "A"
Ọ gara Makerere University Business School ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na International Business.
Tumusiime bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn kemgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Ọ malitere igosi na klọb ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma nke WBS TV, ihe ngosi ya na ndị ọzọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma mere ruo afọ anọ. N'agbata afọ 2010 na 2012, ọ gosipụtara K-files, mmemme ọzọ na WBS TV
Kemgbe afọ 2011, ọ gosiputara ihe ịma aka Guinness football
E gosipụtara ya na NTV (Uganda) na ITV & KTN (Kenya)
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ bụ VJ na Channel O
Ọ bụkwa onye ngosi maka Big Brother Africa na 2012.
Tumusiime nwere obere oge na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi na HOT100 FM n'afọ 2006 tupu ya emechaa biri na Capital FM ebe ọ nọ ruo ugbu a.
